Name: Stela for the scribe of the treasury Nebkaure-seneb
Description: A rectangular stela with a rounded lunette containing udjat-eyes. The decorated surface is divided into several horizontal and vertical lines of inscription, containing the offering formula as well as the names and titles of the owner of the stela and his relatives.In the centre, the owner of the stela is depicted together with his wife. The texts and scenes are very carefully carved. There is a further painted inscription on each edge of the stela.
